data.text: “Atĩrĩrĩ, we nyũmba ya Jakubu, ta thikĩrĩria ũhoro ũyũ,
nĩgũkorwo inyuĩ mwĩĩtaga atũũri a itũũra rĩrĩa inene itheru,
O tene nĩndarathire ũhoro wa maũndũ marĩa magooka,
Nĩgũkorwo nĩndamenyaga atĩ wee ũrĩ mũremi mũno,
Nĩ ũndũ ũcio ndakwĩrire maũndũ maya o tene;
Kũigua nĩmũiguĩte maũndũ macio; ta kĩmarorei mothe.
Maũndũ macio mathondeketwo o rĩu, na ti ma tene;
Wee ndũrĩ waigua kana ũkamenya;
Nĩngwamba kũrũgamia mangʼũrĩ makwa nĩ ũndũ wa rĩĩtwa rĩakwa;
Atĩrĩrĩ, nĩngũtheretie o na gũtuĩka ti ta ũrĩa betha ĩtheragio;
Nĩ ũndũ wakwa niĩ mwene,
“Atĩrĩrĩ, wee Jakubu, ta thikĩrĩria,
Guoko gwakwa kĩũmbe nĩkuo kwahaandire mĩthingi ya thĩ,
“Cookanĩrĩrai hamwe inyuothe na mũthikĩrĩrie:
Niĩ, o niĩ-rĩ, nĩnjarĩtie;
“Nguhĩrĩriai mũthikĩrĩrie ũhoro ũyũ:
Jehova, o we Mũkũũri waku,
Naarĩ korwo nĩmwaiguĩte maathani makwa,
Njiaro cianyu ingĩaingĩhire o ta mũthanga,
Umai bũrũri wa Babuloni,
Matianyootire hĩndĩ ĩrĩa aamatoongoreirie werũ-inĩ;
Jehova ekuuga atĩrĩ, “Andũ arĩa aaganu matikagĩa na thayũ o na rĩ.”
